directions: In a saucepan boil water and sugar, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Cool syrup and chill, covered, until cold.
In a blender purée watermelon chunks until smooth and stir in 1/4 cup syrup, vodka, and lime juice.
Serve coolers over ice in 2 tall glasses and garnish with watermelon rind.
ingredients: 2 cups seeded watermelon chunks (about 1 1/2 pounds with rind)
1/4 cup fresh lime juice, or to taste
Garnish: two 5- to 6-inch- long thin slices watermelon rind with some flesh attached
title: Watermelon Vodka Cooler
